input_text:
Job Title: Medical Technologist, Nights, Baptist Nassau

Location: Fernandina Beach, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Job Summary

$6,000.00 Sign-On Bonus Offered!* 

Baptist Health is looking to add a highly motivated and skilled Medical Technologist to join our team working at Baptist Medical Center Nassau. This is a full-time, night shift opportunity, working from 10:30 PM to 7:00 AM.

This candidate must hold a valid Medical Technologist - Generalist license in the State of Florida before hire and have at least one year of working experience as a Medical Technologist.  This Medical Technologist will be supervised by the Director and Section Supervisors, however, they can perform all responsibilites of this job description without on-site supervision. This candidate will work on a night shift rotating schedule, with a smaller team of two other Medical Technologists. This candidate will have the opportunity to rotate within different areas of the lab and sharpen the skills within each speciality.

As a Medical Technologist, your duties will include, but are not limited to:

Maintaining expertise and performing technical, specimen collection/processing, LIS, general department, and clerical functions in laboratory areas where applicable.Maintaining records of performance as defined in the SOP manualsSupervision by Director and Section Supervisors; can perform all responsibilities without on-site supervision. Supervising MLTs as General Supervisor and serving as Charge Technologist in the abscense of other lab supervisors or MTs. May instruct new employees and students. 

License note: Candidates licensed prior to 1997 are not required to have certification per the State of Florida Licensure Rules.

This Medical Technologist position will be located at Baptist Nassau. If you are interested in this full-time opportunity, please apply now!

 Education Required 

Associate's Degree

Preferred

 Education Preferred 

Bachelor's Degree

Experience

Less than 1 year Medical Technologist Experience

 License and Certification 

Certified Medical Technologist (MT) Preferred OrCertified Medical Laboratory Technician (MLT) Preferred OrLicensed Medical Technologist Required OrLicensed Clinical Laboratory Technician Required Or

 Location 

Baptist Nassau

1250 South 18th Street

Fernandina Beach, FL, 32034

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Medical Technologist, Nights, Baptist Nassau
output_json.summary: Baptist Health seeks a Medical Technologist for a full-time, night shift position at Baptist Medical Center Nassau.

Maintaining records of performance as defined in the SOP manuals
Supervision by Director and Section Supervisors; can perform all responsibilities without on-site supervision.
Supervising MLTs as General Supervisor and serving as Charge Technologist in the absence of other lab supervisors or MTs.
May instruct new employees and students.
